Text.Page:
Something is happening out in Enlightened Union territory. Rumors are circulating about...I don't give much credence to rumors, but I've got to know what's going on.

The secret lie in investigating the creatures out there. Take out some {@linkcreature:122#202#tor mugatos} and {@linkcreature:122#205#oasis ghilliedhus} and we'll see if that helps us at all.
All right. This information you've brought back is a start. Good job.
